document_data.name: Pit of Vipers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pit of Vipers''' was a sprawling stronghold and temple dedicated to [[Sseth]], the World Serpent.
document_data.Location: The Pit of Vipers was found deep within the overgrown [[Black Jungles]] near the northwestern shore of the [[Lapal Sea]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The complex was filled with [[histachii]] who guarded the brood chambers. [[Yuan-ti]] eagerly explored the vast ruins of the temple which also served as the entire capital of [[Serpentes]] during Sseth's rise to power.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: A vast network of subterranean tunnels was rumored to run beneath the Pit of Vipers, connecting it with locations as far south as [[Mhairhetel]], as far north as [[Lapalgard]], and as far west as [[Delselar]].
